dublin_core.dcvalue: This study conducted by MAMA Bangladesh s main implementing partner Dnet captures how community health workers who register moms for the service are using mobile phones The study was funded under a grant provided through USAID s Mobile Solutions and Technical Assistance mSTAR project

Using Mobile Money to Improve Community Health Worker Incentive Schemes
